div.span: Welcome to one of the finest School Districts in the State of Texas. Thank you for taking the time to find out more about our school district and the many excellent programs we have available for our students. FISD is a wonderful place to educate a child. This environment is made possible by the tremendous parent and community support for our schools, as well as by a hardworking and dedicated staff.

div.a: Farwell Schools Closed Through Remainder of 2020 School Year

div.div: Dear Farwell ISD families, the Governor of Texas has called off coming back to school for the remainder of the year. Distance learning will still continue and t...Read more...

div.a: Cafeteria Posts New Hours for Meal Searvice for Kids 1-18 Years of Age

div.div: Farwell ISD community, Starting on Monday, April 6, 2020, the cafeteria will change its meal serving time to 11:30 am to 12:30 pm. Please come during that time ...Read more...
It takes ALL of us to save lives! If we work together, fewer of our friends and family will be affected by the coronavirus. Hospitals won't be overloaded and li...Read more...
The yearbook would like to share pictures of how Farwell students are spending their "self distancing" days. Please email your favorite photos to kschwertner@fa...Read more...

span.em: Click on a highlighted day to see events for that day or select from Upcoming Events Below

div.div: Farwell ISD's mission is to provide quality instruction to all students so they will develop into responsible, adaptable, contributing citizens with caring attitudes. The district is responsible for helping all students achieve their fullest potential since all students can learn. With this in mind, an objective-based curriculum continuum is utilized at all levels. It will include the facility for ongoing evaluation and change in order to meet the evolving needs of students.
